Description: The Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing Quality Engineer is responsible for ensuring that all mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems meet the required quality standards for a project.This includes reviewing design documents, conducting inspections, and testing systems to ensure they are functioning properly.The engineer will also work closely with the project team to identify and resolve any issues that arise during construction.Skills
Skills:
The successful candidate will have excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
Strong knowledge of mechanical, electrical and plumbing systems is required, as well as experience with quality control processes and procedures.
